Header.title: Om Jana makes!
Header.paragraph: Om Jana makes is a small business that makes and sells crochet items. We make everything from baby blankets to adult scarves. We also make custom orders. We are located in the heart of the city and have been in business for over 10 years. We are a family owned business and take pride in our work

About.paragraph: I'm a mother of 3 and have been crocheting for over 20 years. I have only started to sell my items in the last 10 years. I started selling my items at local craft fairs and then started to sell online. I have been selling online for over 5 years now. I love to crochet and I love to make people happy with my items. I take pride in my work and I hope you love my items as much as I do.
Why: To share a piece of my heart
